task.title: Enable SnapMirror on the cluster
task.shortdesc: You must manually enable SnapMirror functionality at the cluster level through the NetAppElement UI. The system comes with SnapMirror functionality disabled by default, and it is not automatically enabled as part of a new installation or upgrade. Enabling the SnapMirror feature is a one-time configuration task.

taskbody.prereq: The storage cluster must be running NetApp Element software.

context.p: SnapMirror can only be enabled for clusters running Element software used in conjunction with volumes on a NetApp ONTAP system. You should enable SnapMirror functionality only if your cluster is connected for use with NetApp ONTAP volumes.

step.cmd: Find the cluster-specific settings for SnapMirror.

info.note: Enabling SnapMirror functionality permanently changes the Element software configuration. You can disable the SnapMirror feature and restore the default settings only by returning the cluster to the factory image.

step.cmd: Click Yes to confirm the SnapMirror configuration change.
